text: Born to Win is a 1971 American black comedy movie directed by Ivan Passer and starring George Segal, Karen Black, Paula Prentiss, Hector Elizondo and Robert De Niro. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Passer Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:1971 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies
title: Born to Win
